abstract: BlackRock’s chief executive, Laurence Fink, talked Tuesday about why he thinks big is beautiful in the asset management business.
snippet: BlackRock’s chief executive, Laurence Fink, talked Tuesday about why he thinks big is beautiful in the asset management business.
lead_paragraph: Big is beautiful. That was one of the messages from Laurence D. Fink, the chief executive of BlackRock, as he walked analysts through the second-quarter results at his company, which is already one of the world’s largest asset managers and about to get even larger.
